title: Candlestick
description: Tall shaft with series of faceted knops; faceted nozzel with cut and shapedeverted rim; domed base spreading to flat circular rim, cut with facets at top and with circular row of printies on underside, notched around bottom outer rim; pontil mark; glass greenish, light, bubbly.

tombstone.epitaph:
Candlestick.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-78.
